title: GD I am thinkkng of starting steroids (Really.)
body:
I have been working out for 2.5 years and it is obvious I work out. But I am not huge enough yet or to the level I want to be at. I am only 23 and I guess that's young but I am sick of being small and frail. Yes I lift heavy and with perfect form but I want to be super huge aesthetically.

Idk what to do. I feel like maybe if I was huge from steroids I may get a boyfriend. Idk what to do. I am so stressed out about not having a bf.

I literally feel worthless with no bf.
